pages.text: Welcome to the AHZ narutomod, this guide book added by the anbubingobook addon will aim to guide you through some of the commonly asked questions in the mod. $(br)To get started with this mod you will need a few things, namely a kunai and a shuriken in your inventory to unlock the ninja advancement

Upon doing the previous step you will be given the advancement, from here you will need to obtain 10 regular mc xp and damage / take damage from a hostile mob to begin getting ninja xp, after which the chakra bar will appear and you will receive all the buffs from being a ninja
